original_title: 女好きの親父は僕の妻をいやらしい目で見ていたんです…。
overview: I hated letting my wife meet my father, who has a bad habit of women. She didn't even invite me to the wedding because I knew she would like it. But her wife wanted to meet my dad, she said. "Because I'm absolutely fine," she said. But my worries were spot on.
title: My Womanizing Step Dad Was Looking At My Wife With Lust In His Eyes… Natsuki Takeuchi
